mapper.select: SELECT qyyg.nid AS accountId , c.cardName AS cardName , fi.id AS picUrl , u.pointId AS pointId , u.pointName AS pointName , u.pointRate AS pointRate , qyyg.jf AS accountBalance FROM tbl_qyyg qyyg LEFT JOIN tbl_qy qy ON qyyg.qy=qy.nid, companyCard cc left join card c on cc.card_Id=c.id ,fileitem fi , unit u WHERE cc.company_Id=qy.nid AND c.picUrl=fi.id AND qyyg.lxdh = #{value} AND c.unit_id = u.pointId;
